Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawable
      • Movable
        • Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DumbEnemy, FollowEnemy, LineEnemy, SmartEnemy

    public abstract class Enemy
extends Movable
    Enemy.java holds the common behaviours of enemies
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Ewan Bradford

        Constructor for the common attributes of enemies
        Parameters:
        x, - x coordinate of the enemy
        y, - y coordinate of the enemy
        sprite, - the filepath to the image representing this enemy
        blockable, - the blocking value of this enemy
        direction, - the direction the enemy is facing

    • Method Detail

      • getDirBlocking

        protected boolean getDirBlocking(Board board)
        Checks the blocking value of the tile infront of this enemy
        Parameters:
        board, - the board this enemy is on
        Returns:
        a boolean true if the tile infront is blocking this enemy

      • getDirBlocking

        protected boolean getDirBlocking(int dir,
                                 Board board)
        Checks the blocking value of the tile in the direction of this enemy
        Parameters:
        dir, - direction to check in
        board, - the board this enemy is on
        Returns:
        a boolean true if the tile in the direction is blocking this enemy
